name: Deep City Detective
description:
Deep City Detective is a top down story driven detective game set in a cyberpunk city. Talk to witnesses and discover clues to discover who is behind the murders.

Deep City Detective is part one of a two part story. It was developed by a team of seven students in Q1 of 2022 at UC Davis.

Credits:

Nathan Green - Story Writer

Ziyu Zhang - Story Writer

Brandon Hillig - Programmer

Aron Murai - Programmer

Makai Fraas - Audio & Map Design

Katlyn Cleaver - Artist

Julia Shin - Artist
